author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Attempt to make HcalSimulationParameters  created from dd4hep as well as from ddd

#### PR validation:

There are 2 cfg's in Geometry/HGCalCommonData/test/data/runHcalSimParameterAnalyzer_cfg.py (DDD) and Geometry/HGCalCommonData/test/data/runHcalSimParameterTest_cfg.py (dd4hep) to test these

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-hcx239 Attempt to make HcalSimulationParameters to be read in for dd4hep
